Game.Name: Teen Titans (USA) (En,Fr)
Game.plot: Story:The Teen Titans get in the mail a video game starring them. When they try to play it, they’re transported into the game’s world. They then travel through the levels trying to find a way home.After defeating Jinx, Gizmo, Mammoth, Mumbo, Plasmus, a bunny, Overload, Cinderblock, and Ternion, Slade reveals himself making Robin think he was the one who sent the video game to them.However after defeating Slade, the Titans find out he is a program like everyone else. The Master of Game then is shown to be behind the bosses, they fight and capture him, and find that he didn’t trap them in the video game world and that the player is the “villain”Cheat: Unlock Asset ViewerMeeting the specified requirement will unlock the corresponding biocard.
Game.Notes: Based on the hit show and DC Comics series, Teen Titans gives gamers the chance to be any of the Teen Titans heroes as they switch in realtime between heroes Robin, Starfire, Beast Boy, Cyborg and Raven to make use of the Teen Titansâ€™ unique moves and abilities. The notorious villains Slade, Overload, Jinx, Gizmo, and Mammoth will all be out, prowling this crime-ridden city and causing mayhem for the teen superheroes.
